Package com.mhealthatlas.apps.search

Class SearchQueryParser

java.lang.Object
com.mhealthatlas.apps.search.SearchQueryParser
@Service
@Scope(value="prototype",
       proxyMode=TARGET_CLASS)
public class SearchQueryParser
extends java.lang.Object
Methods for parsing and tokenizing a given search string

The class contains the basic functionalities for parsing and tokenizing a given search string. Due to time limitations this class was not further developed.
Open points are automatic generation of safe SQL queries, code cleanup to provide easy extension points for new syntax features, creation of a real syntax tree and for the user understandable diagnostic messages (line and char position).

  • Constructor Details

    • SearchQueryParser

      public SearchQueryParser()

  • Method Details

    • parse

      public SearchQueryTokens parse​(java.lang.String searchText)
      Parses and tokenizes a given search text.

      Syntax:
      Toplevel constraints: [filter_column] [method: contains | = | not contains | != ] [value]
      Toplevel constraints: [filter_column] [method: contains | = | not contains | != ] [value] [operator: and | or] [filter_column] [method: contains | = | not contains | != ] [value]
      Toplevel constraints: [sort_column] [ = ] [sort direction]
      Toplevel constraints: [sort_column] [ = ] [sort direction] [,] [sort_column] [ = ] [sort direction]
      [action: filter]: [filter_column] [method: contains | = | not contains | != ] [value];
      [action: filter]: [filter_column] [method: contains | = | not contains | != ] [value] [operator: and | or] [filter_column] [method: contains | = | not contains | != ] [value];
      [action: sort]: [sort_column] [ = ] [sort direction];
      [action: sort]: [sort_column] [ = ] [sort direction] [,] [sort_column] [ = ] [sort direction];

      whereby the action's are chainable (not in the toplevel syntax)

      Parameters:
      searchText - the search text
      Returns:
      the a search query token (only title filter methods are returned)

    • nextTokenState

      private void nextTokenState​(java.lang.Integer symbolIndex)
      Updates current position in the search query and reset the token state after a token is parsed.
      Parameters:
